tool_description: Records detailed location information for workplace incidents including building, floor, room, coordinates, and environmental conditions at the incident site.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

building_name.description: Name or identifier of the building where incident occurred

floor_level.description: Floor or level within the building

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Missing building name: building_name is required and must be at least 2 characters.
Invalid coordinates: If provided, coordinates must be an array of exactly 2 numbers [latitude, longitude].
Coordinate range error: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
usage: Provide incident_id and building_name as minimum requirements. Include floor_level, room_area, and coordinates for more precise location mapping. The tool creates a detailed location record for the incident.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for this location record

full_address.description: Complete formatted address of incident location

location_code.description: Internal location code for the incident site
